functional.notes: Bundle layout, required artifacts, and determinism rules are explicitly defined in code and mirrored in the output contract template.
findings: Bundle artifacts are enumerated with stable ids and clear required/optional semantics.
Bundle validation emits actionable missing-artifact errors with relative paths and stable artifact ids.

correctness_safety.notes: Validation is strict on required artifacts and is explicit about sensors-conditional requirements.
findings: Sensors-conditional artifact (`diagnostics/sync.json`) is only required when sensors are present, avoiding silent assumptions.

performance.notes: Validation cost is constant-time over a small fixed artifact set.
findings: No directory scans or unbounded loops; checks only the fixed artifact list.

security.notes: Pure filesystem existence checks; no command execution or dynamic imports.
findings: No parsing of untrusted content in this unit; only path existence/type checks.

maintainability.notes: Centralizes bundle layout in a single table, enabling downstream tooling to stay consistent.
findings: Stable ids + versioned layout makes future evolution auditable.

summary.notes: Solid contract-first scaffolding; primary gaps are downstream (actual pipeline producers/tests), not in the contract/layout definition.
